title: Uninstall windows 10 updates....it worked for me
body: for all you crashing after champ select and just before the load screen.....

replies.body: It's important that your windows is updated to the most recent version to make sure you have all necessary products and security patches.  If you are crashing of freezing in-game, the culprit may have specifically been with the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  I'd say run the update again but try disabling that.  Hope that helps!
